title: Nandhini's Girl with a Red Nose Ring
description: Alternate Cover Edition B013O35ZRC 'Girl with a Red Nose Ring' is a new Digital Graphic Novel, written and created by filmmaker Nandhini JS (Writer and Director of 'Thiru Thiru Thuru Thuru'). It is the English version of 'Sivappu Kal Mookuthi', the FIRST ever digital comic book originally created in Tamil.
author: Nandhini J.S.
